name: Futsal
description:
Futsal is a minimal top-down 2D soccer/football game for 1-4 players.

The main focus was on creating a fun local-multiplayer experience, with AI opponents and teammates offering the ability to play solo.

The game was designed to be extremely simple to pick-up-and-play. Additional controls such as sprinting, stamina, dribbling/trapping the ball, dummies and the ability to manoeuvre AI teammates allow for some more advanced tactics.

PlatformPCPlayers1-4ControlsGamepad


Future Development Plans:

  • UI Overhaul - overall design & layout, Options Menu
  • AI Improvements - goalkeeper & teammate
  • Keyboard Support
  • General Improvements - gameplay, optimisation, code etc.
  • Enhanced Multiplayer
